entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

Application Description

ÊÉ≥ËÆ©ÂÆ∂Â∫≠ËÅö‰ºö„ÄÅ‰∫≤Â≠êÊó∂ÂÖâÊàñÊúãÂèãÂ∞èËÅöÊõ¥Âä†ÁÉ≠ÈóπÊúâË∂£Ôºü ËØïËØïÊØîÊâãÂàíËÑö ‚Äî ‰∏ì‰∏∫ÂÆ∂Â∫≠‰∫íÂä®ËÆæËÆ°ÁöÑËΩªÊùæÂ®±‰πêÂ∑•ÂÖ∑ÔºÅ Áã¨ÁâπÁöÑÊãºÈü≥ËæÖÂä©ÔºåËÆ©Â§ß‰∫∫Â∞èÂ≠©ÈÉΩËÉΩËΩªÊùæÂèÇ‰∏éÔºåÊ¨¢‰πêÊó†ÈöúÁ¢çÔºÅ ‰∏ªË¶ÅÁâπËâ≤ - ÊãºÈü≥ËæÖÂä©ÔºöËæπÁé©ËæπÂ≠¶ÔºåÂØìÊïô‰∫é‰πê„ÄÇ - Ëá™Áî±ÈÄâÊã©Êó∂ÈïøÔºà1‚Äì5ÂàÜÈíüÔºâÔºöÁÅµÊ¥ªÊéåÊéßËäÇÂ•èÔºåÈÄÇÂêà‰∏çÂêåÂú∫Âêà„ÄÇ - Êó†ÂπøÂëä„ÄÅÊó†ÂÜÖË¥≠ÔºöÁ∫ØÂáÄ‰ΩìÈ™åÔºåÂÆâÂøÉ‰ΩøÁî®„ÄÇ - Êó†ÈúÄËÅîÁΩëÔºåÊó†ÊùÉÈôêËØ∑Ê±ÇÔºöÂÆâÂÖ®ÁÆÄÂçïÔºåÂç≥ÂºÄÂç≥Áî®„ÄÇ - Â∞èÂ∑ßÂÆâË£ÖÂåÖÔºö‰∏ãËΩΩÂø´ÔºåÂç†Áî®Â∞ë„ÄÇ ‰ΩøÁî®ÊåáÂçó - ÈÄâÊã©‰∏Ä‰∏™ËØçÂ∫ìÔºåÊääÊâãÊú∫ÊîæÂú®È¢ùÂ§¥‰∏ä„ÄÇ - ÂÆ∂‰∫∫ÊúãÂèãÁúãÂà∞ËØçÊ±áÂêéÔºåÂèØ‰ª•Ë°®Êºî„ÄÅÊèèËø∞„ÄÅÂî±Ê≠åÊàñË∑≥ËàûÊù•ÊèêÁ§∫„ÄÇ - ‰Ω†ÁåúÂØπ‰∫ÜÂ∞±ÊääÊâãÊú∫Âêë‰∏ãÂÄæÊñúÔºåÁåú‰∏çÂá∫Êù•Â∞±Âêë‰∏äÂÄæÊñúË∑≥Ëøá„ÄÇ ‰∏∞ÂØåËØçÂ∫ìÔºåÊåÅÁª≠Êõ¥Êñ∞ - Âä®Áâ© - ËøêÂä® - Êò•ËäÇ - ÂõõÂ§ßÂêçËëó - ÁæéÈ£ü - ÊÉÖÁª™ - ËÅå‰∏ö - ÁîüÊ¥ªÁî®ÂìÅ Êó†ËÆ∫ÊòØÊò•ËäÇÂõ¢ËÅö„ÄÅÂë®Êú´‰∫≤Â≠êÔºåËøòÊòØÊúãÂèãËÅö‰ºöÔºåÊØîÊâãÂàíËÑöÈÉΩÊòØÁÇπÁáÉÊ∞îÊ∞õÁöÑÊúÄ‰Ω≥ÈÄâÊã©ÔºÅ Á´ãÂç≥‰∏ãËΩΩÔºåÂºÄÂêØÂÖ®ÂÆ∂Ê¨¢Á¨ëÊó∂ÂÖâÂêßÔºÅ

entry.title: The Exit 8
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí $2.79 [$2.79 ~ $3.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$2.79

Application Description

You are trapped in an endless underground passageway. Observe your surroundings carefully to reach "The Exit 8". Don't overlook any anomalies. If you find anomalies, turn back immediately. If you don't find anomalies, do not turn back. To go out from Exit 8. The Exit 8 is a short walking simulator inspired by Japanese underground passageways, liminal spaces and back rooms.

entry.title: Cyber Manhunt
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $2.99 [$2.99 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$2.99

In-App Purchases

  • Home Sweet HomeÔºö$0.99
  • Hello World!Ôºö$0.99

Application Description

Cyber Manhunt is a Cyber-Style, Realistic- Society theme, Story-Rich indie game. The game taked place in the Republic of Alivia with some different theme stories ,but the fate of the characters is closely related in there. It will focus on social issues liking big data, hacking, citizen privacy etc... We want to reveal the profound themes behind the stories with wonderful plots and gamification. And let players pay more attention to Cyber Violence and Privacy Breaches. [Contents] ‚óÜChapter I: Death of a Programmer The CEO of a company committed suicide by jumping off a building, and claimed that he was extorted tens of millions by his wife. While his wife posted photos of domestic violence on social networks. Who is lying? ‚óÜChapter II: Invisible Eyes The indecent video of the female college student went viral on the Internet. At this moment, she was already socially dead. Who is the initiator? Who should protect the safety of women? ‚óÜChapter III: The Evidence Vanishes The student council president, who is both excellent in character and study, suddenly disappeared. The bullying incident made the case more complicated. Who is the murderer and who is the victim? ‚óÜChapter IV: The Price of Humiliation The female singer has been exposed again! Threatening letters, hype, the suicide of former girl group members... The Internet has set off a public opinion carnival again! ‚óÜChapter V: Immortal Code When the society is in madness, are you willing to join the Immortal Code to obtain true love and immortality? ‚óÜDLC: Home Sweet Home Behind this seemingly sweet and happy family, everyone has their own secrets, what is the truth hidden behind?! ‚óÜDLC: Hello World! Senior researcher of Titan Dr. Lucrezia died in a terrible car accident on the spot, but the fellow Benjamin took escape from death. But he did not realize that he was about to be involved in a huge conspiracy‚Ä¶ [Features] ‚óÜHighly Immersive: Gamers play as a hacker in the game, accepts the commission of the company, and solve dangerous incidents. ‚óÜRich Gameplay: There are lots of features of Social Engineering in the game, which is including Detecting, Tracking, Puzzles-Solving, Destroying and Hacking etc.. ‚óÜWonderful Plots: Each chapter in the game will reflect a current hot social topic, such as: Sneak Shot, Cyber Violence, School Bullying, etc... ‚óÜMultiple Roles: There are many different roles in this game with a flash of personality. Their stories would be dug by yourself. ‚óÜFully Dubbing: All the characters in the game have their own voice actors that make the game experience more immersive. ‚óÜOriginal Music: There are some original songs in the game, and the lyrics and vocals are all completed by the studio. [Gameplay] ‚óÜWeb Search: You should collect basic information about the targets through the Internet search. ‚óÜDatabase: You can use the database to get deep information about targets. ‚óÜCrack: You would get passwords based on the obtained target's information, and use it to log in to accounts of different platforms. ‚óÜChat: The exciting thing is that you need to chat with targets by disguise and use the information to get the trust of the target. ‚óÜPhishing: You can send phishing links to hack the targets' hardware devices, and get private information. ‚óÜPicture Analysis: You can get valuable information and relevant clues from pictures. More advanced hacking methods will be unlocked later!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Photo Eraser for iPhone
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$1.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $1.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

On Sale. Original $ 4.99. Photo Eraser magically remove unwanted objects from photos for iPhone and instantly fix your photos. Powered by the latest revolutionary photo InPaint algorithm, Photo Eraser performs the best among all other iPhone erasers that ruin your photos, including popular professional photo processing softwares. A variety of experiments shows the intelligent Photo Eraser will give you better and more natural, amazing results than any similar tools. Photo Eraser quickly remove unwanted objects from photos for iPhone, including logo, text, data stamp, watermark, acnes, people... without any specialist knowledge and instantly fix the photos automatically as if they were never there. InPaint, improve and repair your photos. It targets to be a simple yet effective photo healing app for all iPhone users. Get the magical photos done in seconds-to-minutes instead of minutes-to-hours. People all over the world use Photo Eraser for iPhone every day to beautify their photos. Free download Eraser for iPhone today to be more creativity! Easy to get use & started. You only need mark unwanted area by red color, Photo Eraser for iPhone will make your photo much better in a minute. ‚Ä®‚Ä® Photo Eraser for iPhone features highlights: ‚Ä® ‚àö Remove watermarks, date stamps and much more unwanted objects from photos for iPhone.‚Ä® ‚àö Delete unwanted people from photo for iPhone. ‚Ä® ‚àö Erase text, signatures and other undated objects from photos for iPhone. ‚Ä® ‚àö Make skin imperfections vanish for iPhone. ‚Ä® ‚àö Completely non-technical. ‚àö Support all iPhone device: iPhone 6s+, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6+, iPhone6, iPhone 5s, iPhone5c, iPhones 5, iPhones 4s, iPhone4, iPhone 3gs‚Ä¶ ‚Ä¢ Reviews by our users: - Works pretty well! by rfgf1 It does a fairly thorough job of removing things from the backgrounds of pictures, or objects that are not in the main focus of the original. Using the lasso and only straight lines and drawing a box around the object to be removed, is where I have seen my best results. - Amazing by Twon from VA Works great! I'm using a iPhone 6, IOS 8 Feedback: ‚Ä®Any suggestion will be appreciated, support email: market@effectmatrix.com

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Luck be a Landlord
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $2.99 [$2.99 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$2.99

Application Description

Defeat your landlord in this slot machine roguelike deckbuilder! Your landlord is knocking on your door. You have one coin left to your name. You insert the coin into your slot machine...and...JACKPOT! Luck be a Landlord, tonight! Luck be a Landlord is a roguelike deckbuilder about using a slot machine to earn rent money and defeat capitalism. This game does not contain any real-world currency gambling or microtransactions. Features: 152 Symbols 227 Items 186 Achievements 20 Apartment Floors

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: FyTube - YouTube Without Ads
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $19.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

Our app connects to YouTube in real-time and lets you play any video with exclusive features designed just for you! Highlight Features: ‚Ä¢ Locked screen playback: Keep listening to your videos‚Äô audio in the background. ‚Ä¢ Floating playback (PIP): Use other apps while watching your videos. ‚Ä¢ Sleep timer: Set an automatic shutdown and relax worry-free. ‚Ä¢ Loop mode: Play your favorite video on infinite repeat. It also includes: ‚Ä¢ Toggleable subtitles ‚Ä¢ Playback speed control ‚Ä¢ Quality selection and fullscreen mode ‚Ä¢ Smart search with real-time suggestions (predictive search) ‚Ä¢ Upload date filters: Day, week, month, or year FyTube is perfect for those who don‚Äôt want to miss a single video about their favorite topics. Explore, play, and enjoy your favorite content to the fullest ‚Äî interruption-free! SPECIAL FEATURES FLOATING PLAYBACK Never stop watching! With this feature, you can keep watching your videos while using other apps . Just enter fullscreen mode and tap the PIP button ‚Äî it‚Äôs the second icon at the top of the player. Your video will float on top of your screen no matter what app you open! LOCKED SCREEN PLAYBACK Listen without interruptions! Keep enjoying your video‚Äôs audio even when your screen is off. Perfect for listening to music, podcasts, or your favorite tunes while driving or relaxing. How to activate it? Just lock your device screen. You‚Äôll instantly see the background player. Tap Play ‚Äî and that‚Äôs it! The audio will keep going without pauses. SLEEP TIMER Fall asleep peacefully ‚Äî your app will stop by itself! Enable this feature to automatically stop your videos after the time you choose. Perfect for sleeping or napping without worrying about stopping anything. How to activate it? Tap the timer button, choose how long you want it to run, and that‚Äôs it. Relax and let the app handle the rest! LOOP MODE Play your favorite video over and over again! Enable this feature to make the video repeat automatically as many times as you want. How to know if it‚Äôs on? The icon will turn red when active. (VoiceOver compatible: it will indicate whether it‚Äôs on or off.) Perfect for songs, meditations, or any content you love to repeat! Need help using these features? Visit: fydub.com/fytube BASIC FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Fullscreen high-quality video playback ‚Ä¢ Easy-to-use interface, friendly design ‚Ä¢ Skip forward or rewind anytime ‚Äî never miss the best parts ‚Ä¢ Subtitle activation ‚Ä¢ Adjust playback speed to your preference ‚Ä¢ Change video quality ‚Ä¢ Smart search with real-time suggestions and upload date filters: day, week, month, year, all ‚Ä¢ Each video includes a related videos section to discover more interesting content ‚Ä¢ Discover the latest videos and stay up to date with the news ‚Ä¢ Our app connects directly to YouTube, letting you find any video ‚Ä¢ Enjoy content on any AirPlay-compatible device ‚Ä¢ VoiceOver compatible (enhanced descriptions) ‚Ä¢ No account required ‚Ä¢ We don‚Äôt store cache, cookies, or personal data without your permission ‚Äî watch safely ‚Ä¢ Interface available in 29 languages ‚Ä¢ NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS Get FyTube with a one-time payment and start a new streaming experience ‚Äî ad-free and subscription-free. Minimum Requirements: ‚Ä¢ iOS 13 or later ‚Ä¢ 3G connection or higher Privacy Policy: https://fydub.com/privacy-policy_fytube Terms of Service: https://fydub.com/terms-of-service_fytube Keywords related to our app: youtube, youtube music, youtube vanced, ad blocker for YouTube, no subscription, skip ads on YouTube, music without ads, ad-free, YouTube app, adblocker for YouTube, block pop-ups, remove ads, block ads, adblock, content blocker, no ads, ad-free browser, block advertising, skip ads, ad-free music, YouTube without ads, videos without ads, etc. Have questions about how to use FyTube? Visit fydub.com/fytube or write to us ‚Äî we‚Äôll be happy to help. We reply to all emails: fytube@fydub.com FyTube works with YouTube. The YouTube name and logo are trademarks of Google, Inc. All rights reserved. ¬© FyTube¬Æ

entry.title: FocusDots ¬∑ Focus What Matters
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$1.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $1.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

A Simple Time Management App That Will Increase Your Productivity Keeping yourself focused on tasks can be not easy sometimes. FocusDots is a beautifully designed timer to improve your focus on tasks and discard activity that can divert your attention. FocusDots is a simple time management app with four easy steps: 1) Decide on a single task to be done. 2) Start FocusDots and work on the task until the timer finishes (25 minutes). 3) Take a short break (5 minutes). 4) After completing four Dots, go for a longer break (15 minutes) Features - Elegant minimalist design - Daily Summary - Beautiful crafted design themes - Quotes to inspire and motivate you - Custom timer duration for your tasks Thank you for choosing FocusDots! We sincerely appreciate your support and hope that our app helps you enhance your productivity and time management skills. If you have any feedback or suggestions, we'd love to hear from you!

  • Lifetime VIP(Mac Only)Ôºö$14.99

Application Description

Looking for a feature-packed and efficient media player to manage, organize, and play different types of video content? Enter VidHub! As the newest and most popular media player, VidHub serves up more than just the ability to play all types of video formats. With extensive media library management and network sharing functionalities, VidHub promises stable and speedy video playback for an exceptional user experience. Some of the key features that VidHub offers include: - Support iOS, Mac, Apple TV platform, data synchronization through iCloud - Support for a comprehensive range of video formats, including .mkv„ÄÅ.avi„ÄÅ.mp4„ÄÅ.mov„ÄÅ.rmvb„ÄÅ.wmv, and more - High-quality video playback for HD, 4K, HDR, and various other resolutions - The ability to enable and disable subtitles, with support for embedded and external subtitle formats such as SRT, SSA, and SUB - Network sharing capabilities, with support for SMB/CIFS, WebDav, and other protocols, as well as access to cloud-based video files from Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, and Baidu Netdisk, Aliyun disk, 139 drive, 115 netdisk, enabling easy access to video files on remote servers and cloud storage services. - Support downloading and deleting cloud files - Support renaming cloud files, support add character, replace character, regular expression renaming method. - Support direct-link to Emby, Jellyfin, Plex media server. - Built-in media library management tools, with an intuitive interface for displaying videos and customizable sorting options by type, date, rating, and more. All in all, VidHub offers a fully-featured and outstanding media player experience, delivering the smoothest and highest-quality viewing experience for all types of video content, with all the customizations and features one could desire. Note: The metadata and artwork are sourced from TMDB, a movie and TV show database that is maintained by the community. Privacy Policy and Terms of Use https://okaapps.com/privacy_vidhub https://okaapps.com/terms_vidhub

Application Description

MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success. ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination. REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars. UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry. DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey. YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you. SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

entry.title: Skul: The Hero Slayer
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$7.99 ‚Üí $2.99 [$2.99 ~ $7.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$2.99

Application Description

Skul is a fast-paced action rogue-lite where losing your head is encouraged. Featuring 100 playable characters each with their own unique abilities and a ton of items that can create wild synergies, the battles are as electrifying as they are challenging. The Demon King's Castle in Ruins The human race attacking the Demon King's castle is nothing new and has happened countless times before. What makes this time different though, is that the Adventurers decided to join forces with the Imperial Army and the 'Hero of Caerleon' to lead a full onslaught in hopes of wiping out the Demons once and for all. They attacked the Demon stronghold with overwhelming numbers and succeeded in its total destruction. All of the demons in the castle were taken prisoner except for one lone skeleton named 'Skul'. Dark Mirror Mode Once you're through with the main story, test your skills and limits in the new challenging 'Dark Mirror' mode! FEATURES -You‚Äôre the last hope of the entire demon race! Play as Skul, a tiny skeleton on a path to slay the pompous heroes and save the demon king from the corrupt army of Carleon. -Losing your head never felt so right: try on new skulls to borrow the powers and dashing outfits of their previous owners and create synergies with unique items to defeat your enemies. -What is dead may never die: you will not rest until you have faced all the challenges of this action-packed rogue-lite platformer. -Let your hollow eyes feast upon vibrant, cartoony pixel-art 2D animations as you help all sorts of demonic creatures return to their original state. -From the Mummies of Egypt to the Minotaur of Greece or even an official Dead Cells crossover‚Ä¶ Will you spot all the fun easter eggs scattered across the game? CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE - Revamped interface ‚Äì exclusive mobile UI with complete touch control - Game Center achievements - Cloud Save ‚Äì Share your progress between iOS devices - Compatible with MFi controllers - iPhone 15 Optimization (including Pro Max)

Application Description

What were your childhood games like? Onboard on an epic adventure of more than 20 hours through video games history filled with a ton of funny classical games references. From 2D RPG, through 3D vs fight to a shooter, a trading card game and more you‚Äôll get your fill of jumping from a game genre to another, never bored. ‚ÄúEvoland 2: A slight case of spacetime continuum disorder‚Äù is not only one game but many, backboned with a story that will make you travel through time, discovering different art styles and video gaming technology. Released first on PC with 500.000 copies shipped, we‚Äôre proud to share with you this experience carefully adapted for mobile devices. ¬´ It‚Äôs a mashup on a grand scale ‚Äî and a successful one ‚Äî bringing together many of the elements that make us love all those games individually. ¬ª - 9/10 GamesBeat ‚ÄúEvoland 2 manages to seamlessly blend an incredible number of genres into a single, wonderful experience.‚Äù 4/5 ‚Äì Hardcoregamer Compatible with MFI controllers. If you experience any problem with Evoland 2, please contact our customer support at hello@playdigious.com and give us as much as possible information on your problem.

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.59

Application Description

Evoland is an action adventure game that takes you on a journey through the history of classic adventure and RPG gaming. As you progress through the game, you unlock new technologies, gameplay systems and ever-improving graphics. From monochrome to full 3D graphics and from turn-based battles to real-time boss fights, Evoland makes you live the evolution of adventure gaming ‚Äì all with plenty of humour and nods to moments from classic games. - Play through the history of action-adventure video games - Discover many evolutions, from old school 2D action/adventure to active time battles and full 3D action - Revisit the starting area rendered in full 3D or explore the overworld with your own airship! - And have fun with the dungeons, puzzles, a heap of secrets to uncover, and hundreds of achievements and stars to collect Check out the official website at evoland.shirogames.com Follow us on Twitter @playdigious Like us on Facebook /playdigious If you experience any problem with Evoland, please contact our customer support team at playdigious@gmail.com. Don't forget to specify which device and operating system you are using. Supported languages: English, German, Spanish, French, Chinese, Korean, Japanese

entry.title: Deflection
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [Free ~ $14.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.99

Application Description

Deflection is a powerful, versatile calculator for beams, 2D trusses, and 2D frames. The interface is simple and intuitive, and the graphical output is state-of-the-art. In addition to reaction, shear, bending moment, and deflection results, Deflection also computes internal shear and bending stress along the cross section and along the beam. 2D FRAME AND TRUSS EDITOR The 2D editor is seamlessly integrated with the beam editor. Draw arbitrary frame and truss structures and apply loads and constraints using the same simple interface as for beams. You can visualize results directly within the 2D editor, or you can select a beam and get additional insights. INTERNAL STRESSES Obtain internal bending and shear stress diagrams in addition to shear, bending, and deflection diagrams. The internal stresses can be visualized along the length of the beam as well as along the vertical axis of the cross section using the beam editor. CROSS SECTION EDITOR Edit built-in cross sections. Moment of inertia and area values are automatically calculated and applied to the rest of the beam calculations. MORE FEATURES ‚Ä¢ The built-in database contains more data for your reference and convenience. ‚Ä¢ Apply beam self-weight optionally ‚Ä¢ Unlimited design files ‚Ä¢ Quick-start templates CONTACT We like to hear from you! Please email contact@ketchep.com if you have any issues, questions, or comments.
